abilities.name: KillEffect
abilities.description: Adds an effect on the owner when they kill

properties.name: duration
properties.description: The effect duration in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks)

properties.name: hideParticles
properties.description: Whether to hide the effect particles

properties.name: onlyPlayers
properties.description: Whether to add the effect only when killing players

abilities.name: KillCommand
abilities.description: Runs a command when the owner kills an entity

abilities.name: Effect
abilities.description: Adds an effect on the owner

properties.name: hideParticles
properties.description: Whether to hide the effect particles

abilities.name: Thorns
abilities.description: Allows the owner to reflect a portion of the received damage

properties.name: reflect
properties.description: How much damage to reflect on the attacker based on the received damage (x)

abilities.name: Damage
abilities.description: Increase the amount of damage dealt to certain entities

properties.name: bonuses
properties.description: The damage bonuses based on the dealt damage (x) with entities

abilities.name: Experience
abilities.description: Boosts the amount of experience that the owner receives

properties.name: bonus
properties.description: The amount of experience to add to the earned ones (x)
